TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BmpBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class BmpBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定義用來編碼點陣圖 (BMP) 格式影像的編碼器。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode bitmap (BMP) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點陣圖 (BMP) 格式不支援其他的點陣圖格式，包括全域預覽、 全域縮圖、 全域中繼資料、 框架層級的縮圖、 多個框架和框架層級的中繼資料所支援的功能。Bitmap (BMP) format does not support features that are supported by other bitmap formats, including global preview, global thumbnail, global metadata, frame level thumbnails, multiple frames, and frame level metadata. 編碼不在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化至新的點陣圖影像編碼。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[BmpBitmapDecoderEncoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BmpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/anotherfile.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[BmpBitmapDecoderEncoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BmpBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/BitmapFrame.cs#3)] [!code-vb[BmpBitmapDecoderEncoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BmpBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/BitmapFrame.vb#3)]
